body:
To reply to my own post, I had another generic office model sitting 
around, so I applied the same materials, same sky model and same 
rendering parameters, but the solar disc showed up this time. So perhaps 
it had something to do with how obj2rad was constructing the surfaces? 
*Shrugs*


Alstan
